page.description: Remove case-insensitive duplicate sequential entries from the list.

argument.name: delimiter
argument.description: Optional. Default = CR-LF. The character expression that separates entries in the list.

page.discussion: The *REMOVE_DUPLICATESI() function removes duplicate entries from a list. The list must be sorted in ascending order first. The function is case insensitive.
page.example: dim list as C list = <<%str% one two three four Two one %str% list = sortsubstr(list, crlf() ) ? *remove_duplicatesi(list) = four one three two
